attributes.additional_details: Cancel all standardise testing for year 11 and year 12 students in 2021. By replacing tests with smaller amounts of course work and teacher assessment, students would have a fair chance at achieving their target grades and it would relieve stress for teachers and students.
attributes.background: Cancel all standardise testing for year 11 and year 12 students in 2021-2022. By replacing tests with smaller amounts of course work and teacher assessment, students would have a fair chance at achieving their target grades and it would relieve stress for teachers and students.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326066

Cancel A-level and GCSE exams 2022: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566760
